column4: does anyone know what is the reason for slow loading webpages ? i noticed it happening after 3-4 hours of system uptime,pages like youtube take up to 3-5 mins to load or sometimes it just doesn`t load at all,even google.com takes 1-3 mins to load And i noticed everything going back to normal after i reboot,at least for another 3-4 hours. i`m using ubuntu 10.10
it`s probably been 3 days since i last rebooted my router
yes,tested with bout chrome and firefox
thats a good one i knoe there suggesting alot but sounds like some sort of networking isue
it works just fine after i reboot
it sounds like the driver is having problems coming back from being inactiv
well wifi can be buggy if its a lan its another problem
well something in the network yea
genrely a craling nic = network conflict
just strange it starts hrs later
normaly a nic well slow to being slow if 2 pcs are rying to use the same subnet or ip
has the connecting been stable for those 2 days
thats a good one nic slowing but only after time has passed normal a conflict is visable immadly
